fields.name: name_of_file
fields.title: name of file
fields.description: The file name of the csv

fields.name: date_qc_ran
fields.title: Datetime QC tool ran
fields.description: The datetime when the QC tool has run on the current dataset

fields.name: qctool_version
fields.title: QC tool CSV (JM-IS) version
fields.description: The version of the HBP MIP QC tool that is used to produce this dataset report

fields.name: total_variables
fields.title: total variables
fields.description: The number of columns in the given dataset csv file

fields.name: total_rows
fields.title: total rows
fields.description: The number of rows in the given dataset csv file

fields.name: rows_only_id
fields.title: rows with only id
fields.description: The number of rows that contain only value in the primary key column

fields.name: rows_no_id
fields.title: rows with no id
fields.description: The number of rows that don't contain value in the primary key column

fields.name: rows_complete
fields.title: rows with all columns filled
fields.description: The number of rows that have values in all columns of the dataset csv

fields.title: number of variables with 100% records filled in
fields.description: The number of the dataset's columns that have 100% filled rows

fields.title: number of variables with 80-99.99% records filled in
description: The number of the dataset's columns that have filled rows

fields.title: number of variables with 60-79.99% records filled in
description: The number of the dataset's columns that have filled rows

description: The number of the dataset's columns that have filled rows

description: The number of the dataset's columns that have filled rows
